title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 343.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 343.1 - Applicability

State Regulations

The provisions of the policies of the board of trustees, insofar as they apply to employees in negotiating units established pursuant to
article 14 of the Civil Service Law, shall be continued, provided, however, that during periods of time where there is in effect an agreement between the

State and an employee organization reached pursuant to the provisions of said
article 14, the provisions of such agreement and the provisions of said
policies shall both be applicable. In the event the provisions of the agreement
are different from the provisions of said policies, the provisions of the
agreement shall be controlling. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
343.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
